PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07072015-05-28FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of JEAN SIMON of Saint-David-de-Falardeau, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2017, in the place of Brian A. Henley.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of JEAN SIMON of Saint-David-de-Falardeau, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2017, in the place of Brian A. Henley.
